official.headline: Orderly Reconciliation
official.anchor_line: Returnees participate in structured sessions to aid civic healing.
official.contextual_reframing: Our world-leading Behavioral Compliance Index ensures each citizen’s voice is respectfully integrated. Collective rehabilitation builds city stability.

official.headline: Streamlined Access Confirmed
official.anchor_line: Enhanced identification protocols keep service lines moving smoothly for residents.
official.contextual_reframing: Thanks to advanced system monitoring, Stenograd’s automated urban framework guarantees reliable, fair access for all compliant citizens.

official.headline: Civic Participation Grows
official.anchor_line: Active community engagement in feedback events boosts shared purpose across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s transparent governance prioritizes safe, rational channels for constructive dialogue, strengthening trust in our common future.

underground.headline: Scripts Not Stories
underground.anchor_line: Returnees forced to read Council-approved statements in secret sessions.
underground.contextual_reframing: So-called 'reconciliation' is just control with a new name. Here, the Behavioral Compliance Index (BCI) isn’t just tracking us. It’s rewriting our voices.

underground.headline: Truth Gets Filtered
underground.anchor_line: Analog lines cut again as officials block real returnee statements.
underground.contextual_reframing: The city blocks every real channel. All that leaks out are the Council’s own edits. Don’t trust the screens—trust each other.

underground.headline: People Push Back
underground.anchor_line: Protests break out after Council’s fake apologies leak across the city.
underground.contextual_reframing: Even with every system stacked against us—access, jobs, housing tied to BCI scores—Stenograd’s not as silent as they hoped.
